E G H M N S T

E

equals(TilePuzzle) - Method in class TilePuzzle
A method that tests if two grids in two TilePuzzle's are the same.

G

getGrid() - Method in class TilePuzzle
A method that simply returns the address of the array that the TilePuzzle object is using, permitting further use of that array.
getLayoutFromFile(String) - Static method in class TilePuzzleDriver
Obtain the tile layout from a specified file.

H

hasWon() - Method in class TilePuzzle
The hasWon method checks if there is a winning combination on the grid.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class TilePuzzleDriver
The main method for the tile puzzle game.
maxTileValue() - Method in class TilePuzzle
It searches and returns the greatest numerical value that is on the tiles/array.
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class TileListener
The mouseClicked event.
moveTile(int) - Method in class TilePuzzle
The moveTile method accepts an int that represents the numerical value of a tile.

N

numTileMoves() - Method in class TilePuzzle
A getter method that returns the number of moves the user has made so far.

S

setLabels(int[][]) - Method in class TilePuzzleWindow
The setLabels method updates the labels on the grid according to the given 2D integer array.
setPuzzleWindow(TilePuzzleWindow) - Method in class TileListener
Set the tile puzzle window that this object is listening to.
startGame() - Method in class TilePuzzleTextUI
Start the tile puzzle game, and continue until the player has reached a winning tile layout.

T

testConstructor() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
To test the constructor and the integrity of it's getGrid method.
testequalsFalse() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
Similar to the above test for equals, except in this case the grids are not equal in terms of elements in array.
testequalsFalseDimensions() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
A bit different this time for the equals method, this tests to see if the grids are equals when the elements are similar, but the grid dimensions are different.
testequalsTrue() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
To examine if two grids in two different TilePuzzles are equals.
testgetGrid() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
A test for getGrid, that tests if an array has been correctly passed to the TilePuzzle.
testhasWonFalse() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
Another test for the hasWon method, for an unsolved combination.
testhasWonTrick() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
This test for hasWon contains an array that looks like it's solved, but the last two numbers do not follow sequencial order, in that the last one is 1 above the estimated maximum (so if the grid had a max tile value of 8, this tile would be 9).
testhasWonTrue() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
Testing the hasWon method with a winning combination.
testmaxTileValue() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
A test for maxTileValue that monitors if the greatest value in the grid, which in this case is 8, returns exactly that.
testmaxTileValueRandom() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
Another test for maxTileValue, this time the grid is a bit randomized so that the greatest value occurs first.
testmoveTileDown() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
Another test to see if a tile can move downwards, using moveTile.
testmoveTileInvalid() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
A different test of moveTile, checks to see if an invalid move cannot be completed.
testmoveTileLeft() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
Yet another test for the moveTile method, this time the blank tile is to the left.
testmoveTileRight() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
Finally, a test with the moveTile method to see if the inputted tile can occupy the blank tile to it's right.
testmoveTileUp() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
To see whether a tile can occupy the blank space that is directly above it, using the moveTile method.
testnumTileMoves() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
A simple test for numTileMoves.
testnumTileMovesNone() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
Another test for numTileMoves, this time testing if no moves will register 0.
testtoString() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
A test for toString.
testtoStringComplex() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
Another test for toString.
testtoStringModded() - Method in class TilePuzzleTester
A final test for toString, that has been modified by moveTile.

The TilePuzzleTextUI class.

TilePuzzleWindow - Class in <Unnamed>
The TilePuzzleWindow class sets up a window that communicates with the other aspects of the TilePuzzle classes to set up a graphical uses interface for the game puzzle.

The constructor for the TilePuzzleWindow class.

This method returns the layout of the grid in String format.
